original: de ltar 'brel pa bstan nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'dod pas /
analyzed: de ltar 'brel pa bstan nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'dod pas /

analyzed: thog mar byang chub kyi sems stong pa nyid dang / snying rje'i snying po can bskyed par bya ba yin pas de bshad par 'dod nas dga' dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /

original: dad pa ni gus pa'i bye brag go //
analyzed: dad pa ni gus pa'i bye brag go //

original: mchog ni thams cad kyi mchog go //

original: nye bar gzhag ste ni nye bar blo la gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar gzhag ste ni nye bar blo la gzhag pa'o //

analyzed: 'di skad du nus pa nyid dang // yod pa nyid dang / yon tan dang ldan pa'i chos yum gyi bye brag thams cad bshad de /

analyzed: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa dang / mngon par yid ches pa dang rab tu dang ba ste /

original: thams cad mchog tu bskyed pas mnyan par bya ste /
analyzed: thams cad mchog tu bskyed pas mnyan par bya ste /

original: gzhan du na don med par 'gyur te /

original: ci zhig spangs she na /

analyzed: de yang gnyen po goms par byas pas bsal bar nus pa'i phyir dri ma'o //

original: de ltar bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar bstan par 'gyur ro //

original: dngos po la mngon par zhen pa dang / 'dod chags la zhen pa med par de nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyis mnyan par bya ste /
analyzed: dngos po la mngon par zhen pa dang / 'dod chags la zhen pa med par de nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyis mnyan par bya ste /

original: gzhan du na don rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na don rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, one will not understand the meaning.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po'i phyogs 'di spang ba dang bya ba yang ci zhig mnyan par bya zhe na /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po'i phyogs 'di spang ba dang bya ba yang ci zhig mnyan par bya zhe na /
translated: What is to be listened to, in terms of the abandonment and practice of the adverse and the counteragent?

original: zhi ba mnyan par @5b gyis zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhi ba mnyan par @5b gyis zhes bya ba smos te /

original: mngon par mthong ba'i chos thob pa'i bsam pas mi bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par mthong ba'i chos thob pa'i bsam pas mi bya'o //

original: thar pa'i bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu mthun pa la lus dang ngag dang yid mngon du phyogs pa rgyur gyur pa ni zhi ba'o //üîΩmnyan par gyis ni thos pa'i shes rab bo //
analyzed: thar pa'i bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu mthun pa la lus dang ngag dang yid mngon du phyogs pa rgyur gyur pa ni zhi ba'o // mnyan par gyis ni thos pa'i shes rab bo //

analyzed: rjes kyi yid kyi rnam par shes pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khong du chud par bya'o zhes bya bar 'brel to //

original: 'dir de ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /

original: bsam pa dang bsgom pa zhes bya ba yang gzung bar bya'o //

original: ji ltar de 'brel zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar de 'brel zhe na /
translated: How is it connected?

original: 'gro don mngon zhugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'gro don mngon zhugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúengaged in the welfare of the world,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'gro ba sems can ma lus pa rnams kyi don skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par mtho ba dang / nges par legs pa'i chos thob par bya ba'i phyir de'i don la phyogs pa ni zhugs pa ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba sems can ma lus pa rnams kyi don skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par mtho ba dang / nges par legs pa'i chos thob par bya ba'i phyir de'i don la phyogs pa ni zhugs pa ste /
translated: For the sake of all sentient beings, without exception, in order to attain the Dharma of the higher realms and definite goodness according to their fortune, engaged in that aim, is ‚Äúengaged.‚Äù

analyzed: sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i rim pas zhugs pa yin te /

analyzed: 'dis ni sems dpa' chen po'i sgra'i don bstan to //
translated: This teaches the meaning of the term ‚Äúgreat being.‚Äù

original: des pa ni chos kyi dbyings khyad par du 'phags pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje'i bdag nyid de /
analyzed: des pa ni chos kyi dbyings khyad par du 'phags pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje'i bdag nyid de /

original: sangs rgyas nyid la dga' ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid la dga' ba'o //

original: 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgra'i don bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgra'i don bstan pa'o //
translated: This teaches the meaning of the term ‚Äúbodhisattva.‚Äù

original: des na 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs brnyan spangs nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel te mnyan par bya ba kho na'o zhes nges par gzung gi de dag kho na zhes bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: des na 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs brnyan spangs nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel te mnyan par bya ba kho na'o zhes nges par gzung gi de dag kho na zhes bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúThe bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva, having abandoned the reflection, should listen only in connection with the perfection of wisdom,‚Äù but not ‚Äúonly those,‚Äù

analyzed: byang chub rnam pa gsum ka de med na mi 'byung bas dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: because the three types of enlightenment are taken as the basis, since they do not occur without that.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyi'i sgrar gsungs mod kyi /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyi'i sgrar gsungs mod kyi /
translated: Although the perfection of wisdom is stated as a general term,

analyzed: 'on kyang brda la sogs pa'i stobs kyi khyad par gyis don yin par rtogs te /
translated: nevertheless, through the power of convention and so on, the meaning is understood.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyi don te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyi don te /
translated: The perfection of wisdom has the meaning of the nature of the thought of enlightenment,

analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rnam par bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because it is the compendium of all dharmas.

original: des ni 'di skad du snying rje chen po'i sa bon rab tu sad pa las byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa blang ba la sogs pa dang / stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i snying po can gyi byang chub kyi sems bskyed de /
analyzed: des ni 'di skad du snying rje chen po'i sa bon rab tu sad pa las byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa blang ba la sogs pa dang / stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i snying po can gyi byang chub kyi sems bskyed de /
translated: This is saying that from the arousing of the seed of great compassion, one takes the vow of a bodhisattva and so forth, and one generates the thought of enlightenment with its essence of emptiness and compassion.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob nas skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzhan gyi don bya'o zhes smon lam btab nas sgrub pa phun sum @6a * //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob nas skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzhan gyi don bya'o zhes smon lam btab nas sgrub pa phun sum @6a * //
translated: Having attained perfect complete enlightenment, one should benefit others according to their fortune. Having made this aspiration, one should practice the perfection of the accumulations.

original: tshogs pa bya'o zhes gzhan gyi don la dmigs pa rgyu dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid smon pa dang 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyi sems bskyed pa tshogs kyi lam nas brtsams te /
analyzed: tshogs pa bya'o zhes gzhan gyi don la dmigs pa rgyu dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid smon pa dang 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyi sems bskyed pa tshogs kyi lam nas brtsams te /
translated: This is saying that one should generate the thought of enlightenment with its nature of aspiration and entrance, which has the characteristic of desiring to realize the perfect complete enlightenment that is the result of the cause, which is the observation of the benefit of others.

original: sa'i rim pas sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od kyi bar du gang gis rtogs pa de dag gi bdag nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: sa'i rim pas sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od kyi bar du gang gis rtogs pa de dag gi bdag nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the nature of those who realize the stages of the grounds up to the Buddha ground, the Completely Luminous.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i thos pa la sogs pa'i shes pa bskyed cing bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i thos pa la sogs pa'i shes pa bskyed cing bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should generate and accomplish the wisdom that is like an illusion.

original: zhes don gyis bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes don gyis bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the implied teaching.

original: lam shes pa la sogs pa ma bsgrubs par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bdag nyid sems bskyed pa rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis mi 'grub pa ma yin nam /üîΩde bas na de dag dang ji ltar 'brel par 'gyur zhes zer na /
analyzed: lam shes pa la sogs pa ma bsgrubs par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bdag nyid sems bskyed pa rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis mi 'grub pa ma yin nam / de bas na de dag dang ji ltar 'brel par 'gyur zhes zer na /
translated: If the knowledge of the path and so forth are not accomplished, is it not the case that the bodhisattvas will not accomplish the generation of the mind that is the nature of the knowledge of all aspects?üîΩTherefore, how will they be related?

original: gang la dpa' rnams spyod pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: gang la dpa' rnams spyod pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: In response to this, it is said, ‚ÄúThe bodhisattvas who practice this‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: gang la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'o //
analyzed: gang la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù refers to the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos thams cad las rgyal zhing nyams par mi nus pa yod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' ste dpa' ba'o //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos thams cad las rgyal zhing nyams par mi nus pa yod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' ste dpa' ba'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas are the heroes who are victorious over all phenomena that are discordant factors and cannot be defeated.

original: chos ma lus pa la goms pa dang ldan pas zhugs pa de lta bu ni sems bskyed pa'i rang gi ngo bo ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos ma lus pa la goms pa dang ldan pas zhugs pa de lta bu ni sems bskyed pa'i rang gi ngo bo ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Such an entry, endowed with the cultivation of all dharmas, is the essence of the generation of the resolve, which is the perfection of wisdom.

original: de lta bas na 'di skad du ji skad bshad pa'i sems bskyed pa la ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan med de /
analyzed: de lta bas na 'di skad du ji skad bshad pa'i sems bskyed pa la ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan med de /
translated: Thus, it is said that there is no dharma other than the generation of the resolve as it has been explained.

original: gdams ngag la sogs pa yang khyad par gyi don bstan pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa'i rab tu dbye ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: gdams ngag la sogs pa yang khyad par gyi don bstan pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa'i rab tu dbye ba kho na yin no //
translated: And the instruction, etc., are also just the divisions of the generation of the resolve, because they are taught for the sake of a special meaning.

original: de bas na de'i rang bzhin rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' thob par bya ba ma lus pa'i chos bsdus nas dang por bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na de'i rang bzhin rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' thob par bya ba ma lus pa'i chos bsdus nas dang por bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the nature of that, i.e., the generation of the resolve, is the knowledge of all modes, which is the enlightenment of the Bodhisattva. Having summarized all dharmas that are to be attained by the Bodhisattva, it is taught first.

original: de lta yin na ci'i phyir stong phrag brgya pa las byang chub sems dpa'i lam shes pa la sogs pa tha dad par bstan ces zer na smras pa gang gi phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi yin te /
analyzed: de lta yin na ci'i phyir stong phrag brgya pa las byang chub sems dpa'i lam shes pa la sogs pa tha dad par bstan ces zer na smras pa gang gi phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi yin te /
translated: It is said that because the knowledge of all aspects is that of a buddha,

original: rgyu dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu thob pa la ltos nas bstan pa'i phyir gsungs la /
analyzed: rgyu dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu thob pa la ltos nas bstan pa'i phyir gsungs la /
translated: it is taught in dependence on the attainment of the result together with its cause.

original: tshogs kyi bsgrub par rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa sa'i tshogs 'dus mod kyi /
analyzed: tshogs kyi bsgrub par rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa sa'i tshogs 'dus mod kyi /
translated: Although the accumulations of the stages such as the Joyous are gathered,üîΩthey are not the mother of bodhisattvas such as those on the path of seeing and so on.

original: 'on kyang mthong ba'i lam la sogs pa rgyal ba'i sras rnams la ma ma yin no zhes dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir gsal bar bshad pa dang don rab tu phye ba @6b yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang mthong ba'i lam la sogs pa rgyal ba'i sras rnams la ma ma yin no zhes dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir gsal bar bshad pa dang don rab tu phye ba @6b yin no //
translated: To dispel such doubts, it is clearly explained and its meaning is distinguished.

original: de pas na de nyid las lam shes pa tha dad par bkol nas rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa sa bdun pa la zhugs pa'i rab tha dad par logs shig tu lam shes par gzhag go //
analyzed: de pas na de nyid las lam shes pa tha dad par bkol nas rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa sa bdun pa la zhugs pa'i rab tha dad par logs shig tu lam shes par gzhag go //
translated: Therefore, in that text, knowledge of the path is distinguished and it is separately posited as knowledge of the path for those who have entered the seven stages such as the Joyous.

original: de lta bas na lam shes pa la ni lam thams cad shes par bya dgos pas nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam ston mod kyi /
analyzed: de lta bas na lam shes pa la ni lam thams cad shes par bya dgos pas nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam ston mod kyi /
translated: Thus, since one must know all paths in order to know the path, the path of sravakas and so on are indeed taught.

original: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lam bstan pas ldog pa'i sgo nas yang 'phangs pa'i mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi lam nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam yin na snyom du dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir dang / rab tu spros pas bde blag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yang de nyid las logs shig tu thams cad shes pa nyid tha dad par sa bdun par gzhag ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lam bstan pas ldog pa'i sgo nas yang 'phangs pa'i mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi lam nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam yin na snyom du dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir dang / rab tu spros pas bde blag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yang de nyid las logs shig tu thams cad shes pa nyid tha dad par sa bdun par gzhag ste /
translated: However, since the path of the bodhisattva is taught, the path of sravakas and so on is feared to be the same, so in order to eliminate that fear and in order to easily understand through extensive elaboration, the path of impermanence and so on, which is different from the path of the bodhisattva, is posited as the seventh stage of the knowledge of all aspects in the AbhisamayiilaJlkara.

original: lam ltar snang ba la sogs pa'i skyon rnams spangs te kun rdzob kyi bden pa tsam la gzhag go //
analyzed: lam ltar snang ba la sogs pa'i skyon rnams spangs te kun rdzob kyi bden pa tsam la gzhag go //
translated: It is posited as merely conventional reality, abandoning the faults of the path that appears to be the path and so on.

original: gzhan du na de dag la rtogs pa skye bar mi rigs so //
analyzed: gzhan du na de dag la rtogs pa skye bar mi rigs so //
translated: Otherwise, it would be illogical for them to generate realization.

original: de'i rjes thogs la rnam pa dang / lam dang / dngos po'i shes pa'i rnam pa thams cad bsdus nas dbang du bya ba'i phyir yang dang yang du mngon du byed pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / lam shes pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin khyad par gyi lam stobs can sa brgyad pa mi g-yo ba de'i dbye ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs pa rtogs pa bstan to //
analyzed: de'i rjes thogs la rnam pa dang / lam dang / dngos po'i shes pa'i rnam pa thams cad bsdus nas dbang du bya ba'i phyir yang dang yang du mngon du byed pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / lam shes pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin khyad par gyi lam stobs can sa brgyad pa mi g-yo ba de'i dbye ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs pa rtogs pa bstan to //
translated: Immediately after that, in order to bring together and master all the aspects of knowledge of aspects, paths, and things, one repeatedly manifests the knowledge of all aspects. Immediately after that, in order to realize the divisions of the powerful special path of the eighth level, the Immovable, which has the nature of path knowledge and so on, the complete realization of all aspects is taught.

original: de'i rjes la gnyen po'i tshogs dang / nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa'i rab tu dbye ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gsal ba rab kyi mthar thug par 'gro ba khyad par gyi lam de nyid yid la byed pa ni legs pa'i blo gros la sogs pas gnyis ni rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa bstan
analyzed: de'i rjes la gnyen po'i tshogs dang / nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa'i rab tu dbye ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gsal ba rab kyi mthar thug par 'gro ba khyad par gyi lam de nyid yid la byed pa ni legs pa'i blo gros la sogs pas gnyis ni rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa bstan
translated: Immediately after that, in order to realize the divisions of the accumulation of antidotes and the accomplishment of definite emergence, one focuses on that very special path that goes to the ultimate end of clarity. These two are the realization of the peak.

original: to // de'i rjes thogs la sa bcu pa'i bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas skabs su so so dang bsdus pa bsgom pa'i don gyi go rims bstan par bya ba'i phyir rim pa bzhin bya ste /
analyzed: to // de'i rjes thogs la sa bcu pa'i bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas skabs su so so dang bsdus pa bsgom pa'i don gyi go rims bstan par bya ba'i phyir rim pa bzhin bya ste /
translated: Then, immediately after that, in order to show the sequence of the meanings of the meditations of the individual and the combined on the occasion of the uninterrupted samadhi up to the tenth stage, one should act in sequence.

original: de nyid bsgom pa ni mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i mthar phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid bsgom pa ni mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i mthar phyin pa'o //
translated: The meditation on that is the culmination of the realization of the serial.

original: de nas go rims bzhin du bsgom pa'i chos rnams shin tu goms par byas pas skad cig gcig la de nyid kyi gnas skabs rtogs pa de nyid skad cig gcig la mngon par byang chub pa rdzogs pa yin no //üîΩde'i rjes la rnam pa thams cad @7a * //
analyzed: de nas go rims bzhin du bsgom pa'i chos rnams shin tu goms par byas pas skad cig gcig la de nyid kyi gnas skabs rtogs pa de nyid skad cig gcig la mngon par byang chub pa rdzogs pa yin no // de'i rjes la rnam pa thams cad @7a * //
translated: Then, in sequence, by thoroughly familiarizing with the phenomena of meditation, in one instant that very realization of the state of that is the perfection of instant manifest enlightenment.

original: mngon du byed pa ched du bya ba gsum mngon sum du byas nas rtogs pa de nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od la chos kyi skur mngon par byang chub pa mthar phyin pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon du byed pa ched du bya ba gsum mngon sum du byas nas rtogs pa de nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od la chos kyi skur mngon par byang chub pa mthar phyin pa yin no //
translated: After that, in order to manifest all aspects, having actualized the three purposes, that very realization is the perfection of manifest enlightenment as the dharmakaya on the stage of the Buddha, the Universal Light.

original: de lta bas na sems bskyed pa sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa brgyad bsdus te /
analyzed: de lta bas na sems bskyed pa sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa brgyad bsdus te /
translated: Thus, the generation of the Thought is included in the knowledge of all modes and the eight realizations, by way of the nature of an illusion.

original: de ltar lung las nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar lung las nges pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is ascertained from the scriptures.

original: rigs pa las kyang rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: rigs pa las kyang rtogs par bya ste /

original: 'di ltar gang yod par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de ni yod pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar gang yod par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de ni yod pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin te /
translated: Thus, whatever is the character of the object of apprehension of existence is the domain of the convention of existence,

original: dper na shes pa'i ngo bo bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na shes pa'i ngo bo bzhin no //
translated: like, for example, the nature of consciousness.

original: sngon po la sogs pa yang yod par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa yang yod par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
translated: Blue, etc. are the character of the object of apprehension of existence, is a natural reason.

original: ba lang rdzi'i skye bo yan chad kyis nyams su myong bar grub pa'i phyir ma grub pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: ba lang rdzi'i skye bo yan chad kyis nyams su myong bar grub pa'i phyir ma grub pa yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not unestablished because it is established by the experience of all people, even cowherds.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pas 'gal ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pas 'gal ba yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not contradictory because it is present in the concordant example.

original: de lta bu'i don kyang 'gegs na ni yod pa'i tha snyad thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro zhes bya bas bzlog na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma yod pas ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i don kyang 'gegs na ni yod pa'i tha snyad thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro zhes bya bas bzlog na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma yod pas ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs kyang ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since there is a valid reductio argument, the reason is not indeterminate.

original: de bas na phyi'i don yod par 'grub bo zhes zer na ma yin te /
analyzed: de bas na phyi'i don yod par 'grub bo zhes zer na ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that external objects are established as existent.

original: gang gi phyir gang zhig rig pa na gang rig pa'i thabs med pa de ni rig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang zhig rig pa na gang rig pa'i thabs med pa de ni rig pa ma yin te /
translated: Because when something is cognized, there is no means of cognizing something else, it is not cognized.

original: sngon po rig pa na ser po mi rig pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sngon po rig pa na ser po mi rig pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, when blue is cognized, yellow is not cognized.üîΩMoreover, when the nature of consciousness is cognized, there is no means of cognizing the external object that is desired.

original: yang shes pa'i bdag nyid rig par gyur pa na mngon par 'dod pa'i phyi'i don rig pa'i thabs med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: yang shes pa'i bdag nyid rig par gyur pa na mngon par 'dod pa'i phyi'i don rig pa'i thabs med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is a nonobservation of a pervader.

original: gang gi phyir nye ba'i rgyu mtshan med pas na rnam pa med pas kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nye ba'i rgyu mtshan med pas na rnam pa med pas kyang ma yin no //
translated: Because there is no proximate reason, it is not the case that there is no aspect.

original: shin tu thal ches pa'i phyir gzhan gyi rnam pas kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: shin tu thal ches pa'i phyir gzhan gyi rnam pas kyang ma yin no //
translated: Because it is too extreme, it is not the case that there is another aspect.

original: med na mi 'byung ba med pas 'khrul pa srid pa'i phyir rnam pa dang bcas pas kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba med pas 'khrul pa srid pa'i phyir rnam pa dang bcas pas kyang ma yin no //
translated: Since there is no invariable concomitance, error is possible, so it is not even with the aspect.

original: phyogs gzhan yang mi srid pas shes pa gzhan med pas na don rig pa'i thabs med pa'i phyir ma grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyogs gzhan yang mi srid pas shes pa gzhan med pas na don rig pa'i thabs med pa'i phyir ma grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Since another position is not possible, and there is no other consciousness, there is no means of knowing objects, so it is not unestablished.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pas 'gal ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pas 'gal ba yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is it contradictory, since it exists in the similar class.

original: rig pa'i thabs med pa yang rig na ni thams cad kyang rig par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bas bzlog na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma yod pas ma nges pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: rig pa'i thabs med pa yang rig na ni thams cad kyang rig par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bas bzlog na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma yod pas ma nges pa yang ma yin no //
translated: If it is known without a means of knowing, it follows that everything would be known. Thus, since there is a valid cognition that contradicts that, it is not indeterminate.

original: de lta bas sngar gtan tshigs @7b dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ma grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas sngar gtan tshigs @7b dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ma grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the reason stated earlier, ‚Äúbecause of the perception of a reason,‚Äù is not unestablished.

original: bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog par grub pas 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog par grub pas 'gal ba yin te /
translated: It is contradictory because it is established as the opposite of the probandum.

original: rnam par shes pa de nyid ma rig pa'i stobs kyis sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam par rig pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa de nyid ma rig pa'i stobs kyis sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam par rig pa yin no //
translated: That very consciousness is the cognition of blue and so on by the power of ignorance.

original: shes pa tsam gyis ngo bor 'dus pas gnyis med pa nyid du 'grub po zhes zer na /
analyzed: shes pa tsam gyis ngo bor 'dus pas gnyis med pa nyid du 'grub po zhes zer na /
translated: If you say that the non-dual is established because of being included in the nature of mere consciousness,

original: de lta mod kyi 'on kyang der snang ba las tha dad par grub pa'i mtha' la sogs pa la brten te de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i chos gzhan yongs su rtog gam /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi 'on kyang der snang ba las tha dad par grub pa'i mtha' la sogs pa la brten te de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i chos gzhan yongs su rtog gam /

original: 'on te ma yin par rtog grang na /
analyzed: 'on te ma yin par rtog grang na /
translated: Or do you not imagine that?

original: gal te phyogs dang po yin na ni gang zhig phyin ci ma log pa'i rnam par shes pa de ni sgro btags pa'i chos gzhan 'dzin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te phyogs dang po yin na ni gang zhig phyin ci ma log pa'i rnam par shes pa de ni sgro btags pa'i chos gzhan 'dzin pa ma yin te /
translated: If it is the first case, then that which is non-erroneous consciousness does not apprehend another superimposed phenomenon,

original: 'ga' zhig nor bu'i gzugs la sogs pa la ma 'khrul ba'i shes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig nor bu'i gzugs la sogs pa la ma 'khrul ba'i shes pa bzhin no //
translated: like the consciousness of someone who is not mistaken about the form of a jewel, etc.

original: shes pa 'di yang phyin ci ma log pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: shes pa 'di yang phyin ci ma log pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa yin no //
translated: This consciousness is non-erroneous, is a reason that is contradictory to the pervasion.

original: sgro btags pa ma lus pas dben pa rtog pa dang bral ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad bdag nyid la yod pa tsam du nyams su myong bas ma grub ba ma yin no //
analyzed: sgro btags pa ma lus pas dben pa rtog pa dang bral ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad bdag nyid la yod pa tsam du nyams su myong bas ma grub ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not unestablished, since it is experienced as the mere presence in oneself of the mind and mental functions free from all conceptual elaborations and free from conceptualization.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa'i phyir 'gal ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa'i phyir 'gal ba yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is it contradictory, since it exists in the concordant class.

original: sgro btags pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo rig par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bas bzlog na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma yod pas gtan tshigs ma nges pa yang ma yin no //

translated: Nor is it an indefinite reason, since there is a valid cognition that contradicts the reversal of the reason, ‚Äúbecause it is not known by nature to apprehend the phenomena of conceptual elaborations.‚Äù

original: phyogs gnyis pa khas len na de'i tshe snang ba'i don la bsnyon rtol bya bar mi nus pa sgro btags pa'i chos kyi dben pa don tsam rtogs pa 'di nyid sgyu ma nyid du shes so zhes bya ba ni ming tsam la rtsod pas 'di ni gyi na'o
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa khas len na de'i tshe snang ba'i don la bsnyon rtol bya bar mi nus pa sgro btags pa'i chos kyi dben pa don tsam rtogs pa 'di nyid sgyu ma nyid du shes so zhes bya ba ni ming tsam la rtsod pas 'di ni gyi na'o
translated: If one accepts the second position, then it is not possible to refute the appearance of objects, and so one should understand that this mere object, which is the realization of the mere object that is the absence of the phenomena of conceptual elaborations, is itself an illusion.üîΩThis is just quibbling over mere words. This is just silly.

original: // gnyis su med pa'am gnyis zhes pa de nyid sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir snying po med de /
analyzed: // gnyis su med pa'am gnyis zhes pa de nyid sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir snying po med de /

translated: Because there is no valid cognition that establishes this meaning.

translated: Thus, the mere generation of the thought, the essence of the perfection of wisdom, which is established by a brief summary of scriptures and reasonings, is not the uncommon path of bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas.

original: de bzhin @8a * //
analyzed: de bzhin @8a * //
translated: If that is so, then how is it that those who do not have realization of this very dharma are said to be empowered to teach the eight realizations in the S≈´tra of a Hundred Thousand Stanzas and so on?

original: bdag ni bdag tu gzhag pa nyid kyi rgyud la bsgoms pa'i stobs kyi sems rab tu zhi ba'o //
analyzed: bdag ni bdag tu gzhag pa nyid kyi rgyud la bsgoms pa'i stobs kyi sems rab tu zhi ba'o //
translated: The self is the self-abiding, and the mind is the pacification of the mind through the power of meditation.

original: gnas pa ni rnam pa du ma'i yon tan skyed par byed pa'i chos kyi mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa de lung ston par mdzad de /
analyzed: gnas pa ni rnam pa du ma'i yon tan skyed par byed pa'i chos kyi mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa de lung ston par mdzad de /
translated: The bodhisattva who abides in the supreme meditative concentration that generates the many aspects of virtue is predicted to achieve enlightenment.

original: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas rigs nges pa'i phyir phyir mi ldog par ro //
analyzed: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas rigs nges pa'i phyir phyir mi ldog par ro //
translated: Because the former tathƒÅgatas have ascertained his lineage, he is irreversible.

original: de lta bu nyid bdag gis ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ce na /
analyzed: de lta bu nyid bdag gis ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ce na /
translated: ‚ÄúI am in meditative concentration in that way‚Äù

original: de las langs zhes rlom sems med do //
analyzed: de las langs zhes rlom sems med do //
translated: and ‚ÄúI have arisen from that‚Äù are not his conceit.

original: las mtha' ni yul gyi dngos po las so //
analyzed: las mtha' ni yul gyi dngos po las so //
translated: The extreme of action is from the entity of the object.

original: de la 'dzin pa'i char nges pa ni mtha'o //
analyzed: de la 'dzin pa'i char nges pa ni mtha'o //
translated: The extreme is ascertained as a part of grasping.

original: las byed pa po gnas pa ni bya ba ste /
analyzed: las byed pa po gnas pa ni bya ba ste /
translated: The abiding of the agent of action is activity.

original: chos de rnams kyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: chos de rnams kyi rang bzhin te /
translated: The nature of those phenomena

original: de bzhin nyid rang bzhin du yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba nas rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid rang bzhin du yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba nas rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: is thoroughly known as suchness, up to realized.

original: 'di skad du chos 'di nyid ni gnyen po yin pa'i phyir spyod pa dang mi spyod pas stong pas thos pa la sogs pa'i shes pa skyes nas rtogs pa na gang la spyad par bya ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs pa rtogs pas zhen pa med par rtogsüîΩpar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di skad du chos 'di nyid ni gnyen po yin pa'i phyir spyod pa dang mi spyod pas stong pas thos pa la sogs pa'i shes pa skyes nas rtogs pa na gang la spyad par bya ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs pa rtogs pas zhen pa med par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is said, Because this dharma is the antidote, it is empty of practice and non-practice. When realization arises through the arising of the knowledge of hearing and so forth, one realizes that no dharma whatsoever that is to be practiced is observed, and thus one realizes without attachment.

original: de ltar spyod pa ni bde bar gshegs pa dang 'brel pa nyid kyi shes rab chos kyi mchog gi rang bzhin la de spyod pa yin no zhes rim pa gzhan du sbyar ro //
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa ni bde bar gshegs pa dang 'brel pa nyid kyi shes rab chos kyi mchog gi rang bzhin la de spyod pa yin no zhes rim pa gzhan du sbyar ro //
translated: Thus, the practice is connected with the Sugata, and the nature of the supreme dharma is wisdom. One should apply this in sequence.

original: des rnam par mi rtog pa la sogs pa'i rnam par gyur pa bstan to //
analyzed: des rnam par mi rtog pa la sogs pa'i rnam par gyur pa bstan to //
translated: Thus, the transformation into non-conceptuality and so forth is shown.

original: ci'i phyir 'di rgyu yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'di rgyu yin zhe na /
translated: Why is this the cause?

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, This... and so forth.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa dang rnam pa gnyis chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po'i dbye bas phye bas chos kyi mchog gi rang bzhin gyi shes rab ni shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa dang rnam pa gnyis chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po'i dbye bas phye bas chos kyi mchog gi rang bzhin gyi shes rab ni shes pa'o //
translated: Here, this refers to the wisdom that is the nature of the supreme dharma, distinguished by the two aspects of object and aspect, divided into small, medium, and great.

original: de nas nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub gang yang rung ba'i rang gi theg pa la ltos nas khyad par du 'gro ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog go //
analyzed: de nas nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub gang yang rung ba'i rang gi theg pa la ltos nas khyad par du 'gro ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog go //
translated: Then, in relation to one's own vehicle, any enlightenment of the sravaka and so on, it is the supreme perfection because it is superior.

original: byang chub thams cad thob pa'i rgyu nyid du gnas pa'i phyir spyod pa yin pa'am /
analyzed: byang chub thams cad thob pa'i rgyu nyid du gnas pa'i phyir spyod pa yin pa'am /
translated: It is practice because it is the cause for attaining all enlightenments, or

original: mos pas spyod pa'i sa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir spyod pa yin no des @12b rgyu nyid du gyur pa bstan to //
analyzed: mos pas spyod pa'i sa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir spyod pa yin no des @12b rgyu nyid du gyur pa bstan to //
translated: it is practice because it is the nature of the stage of devoted engagement.

original: don de dag 'dir bsdus nas rigs pa'i stobs kyis ji ltar bstan pa ni dmigs pa dang / rnam pa dang / dro ba chung ngu la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i skyed pa bstan pa yin par gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: don de dag 'dir bsdus nas rigs pa'i stobs kyis ji ltar bstan pa ni dmigs pa dang / rnam pa dang / dro ba chung ngu la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i skyed pa bstan pa yin par gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Those meanings are summarized here, and one should understand that the teaching on the generation of the aspects of lesser heat and so on is by the power of reasoning.

original: gang yang stong phrag brgya pa las chung ngu la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi dmigs pa dang rnam pa bye brag tu bstan te /
analyzed: gang yang stong phrag brgya pa las chung ngu la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi dmigs pa dang rnam pa bye brag tu bstan te /
translated: Also, the Sata-sahasrika teaches the distinctions of lesser and so on in terms of the focal object and aspects.

original: 'khor der 'dus pa'i gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi log par rtogs pa bsal ba'i phyir bstan to //
analyzed: 'khor der 'dus pa'i gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi log par rtogs pa bsal ba'i phyir bstan to //
translated: It is taught in order to remove the false conceptions of the persons who are disciples assembled in that circle.

original: 'dir yang de dag sbyar bar mi nus te /
analyzed: 'dir yang de dag sbyar bar mi nus te /
translated: Here, it is not possible to apply those,

original: tshigs su bcad pa dang de dag nyid 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa dang de dag nyid 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the verses and those are not connected.

original: de lta bas na gang gi tshe ji skad bstan pa'i dmigs pa dang / rnam pa bsgoms pa na tha dad pa'i don la mngon par zhen pa med par cung zad gsal ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba thams cad sems tsam nyid du yang mthong ba de'i tshe dro ba'i gnas skabs yin te /
analyzed: de lta bas na gang gi tshe ji skad bstan pa'i dmigs pa dang / rnam pa bsgoms pa na tha dad pa'i don la mngon par zhen pa med par cung zad gsal ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba thams cad sems tsam nyid du yang mthong ba de'i tshe dro ba'i gnas skabs yin te /
translated: Therefore, when one cultivates the object and the aspects as they have been taught, and sees that all the appearances of the clear light of knowledge, in which there is no attachment to the meaning of difference, are mind only, then that is the stage of heat.

original: theg pa chen po las snang ba thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bstan to //
analyzed: theg pa chen po las snang ba thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bstan to //
translated: It is taught in the Mahayana as the samadhi of attaining light.

original: gang gi tshe yang bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis chung ngu la sogs pa'i gsal bar snang ba'i 'bring gi ye shes kyi snang ba thob par gyur pa de'i tshe rtse mo'i gnas skabs na snang ba mched pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe yang bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis chung ngu la sogs pa'i gsal bar snang ba'i 'bring gi ye shes kyi snang ba thob par gyur pa de'i tshe rtse mo'i gnas skabs na snang ba mched pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yin no //
translated: When, by the power of meditation, one attains the appearance of the lesser and medium pristine wisdom of clear appearance, at that time, in the stage of peak, it is the samadhi called ‚Äúappearance increase.‚Äù

original: gang gi tshe yang sems tsam nyid la gnas nas gsal bar snang ba 'bring dang chung ngu'i ye shes kyi snang ba rgyas pa de'i tshe bzod pa'i gnas skabs 'dzin pa'i sa la zhugs pa de kho na nyid kyi don gyi phyogs gcig la zhugs pa zhes byaüîΩba'i ting nge 'dzin yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe yang sems tsam nyid la gnas nas gsal bar snang ba 'bring dang chung ngu'i ye shes kyi snang ba rgyas pa de'i tshe bzod pa'i gnas skabs 'dzin pa'i sa la zhugs pa de kho na nyid kyi don gyi phyogs gcig la zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yin no //
translated: When, abiding in mind-only, the appearance of the medium and lesser pristine wisdom of clear appearance increases, at that time, in the stage of acceptance, it is the samadhi called ‚Äúentering the level of retention‚Äù and ‚Äúentering one aspect of the meaning of thatness.‚Äù

original: gang gi tshe yang don la 'dzin pa spangs nas mi snang ba'i chung ngu la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba skyes pa de'i tshe chos kyi mchog gi gnas skabs de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe yang don la 'dzin pa spangs nas mi snang ba'i chung ngu la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba skyes pa de'i tshe chos kyi mchog gi gnas skabs de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba yin no //
translated: When, abandoning the retention of the meaning, the appearance of the lesser pristine wisdom of non-appearance arises, at that time, in the stage of the supreme mundane quality, it is the samadhi called ‚Äúimmediately preceding.‚Äù

original: yang ting nge 'dzin de dag thams cad la shin tu mos pa bstan pa ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa zhes bya ba yin no //üîΩde nyid las brtsams te rnam par rtog pa byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa rnams rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam gyi bar du bsgrub pa'i phyir nges par 'byed pa'i cha bzhir go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gzung ba dang
analyzed: yang ting nge 'dzin de dag thams cad la shin tu mos pa bstan pa ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa zhes bya ba yin no // de nyid las brtsams te rnam par rtog pa byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa rnams rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam gyi bar du bsgrub pa'i phyir nges par 'byed pa'i cha bzhir go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gzung ba dang
translated: Moreover, the teaching of the intense aspiration for all those meditative stabilizations is the stage of action through aspiration.üîΩBeginning from just that, the four aspects of the penetrating insight are taught in order to establish the bodhisattva's obscurations that consist in the discursive thought, on the path of seeing up to the culmination of the peak.

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzhi dang ldan par rten ces bstan to //üîΩde la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang gnyen @13a * //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzhi dang ldan par rten ces bstan to // de la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang gnyen @13a * //
translated: The four aspects of the penetrating insight are to be understood in order, as endowed with the four discursive thoughts that consist in the apprehended object and the apprehending subject.üîΩTherein, in order to teach the two discursive thoughts that consist in the apprehended object and the apprehending subject, which are based on the things that consist in defilement and the counteragent, he says:

original: po'i dngos po rten can gyi gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis bstan pa'i phyir gang zhig yod pa ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: po'i dngos po rten can gyi gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis bstan pa'i phyir gang zhig yod pa ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: That which does not exist and so on.

original: snang ba ji ltar rtogs pa'i don 'di dag gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma med pas na yod pa thob pa ma yin no //
analyzed: snang ba ji ltar rtogs pa'i don 'di dag gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma med pas na yod pa thob pa ma yin no //
translated: Since there is no inferential valid cognition of the meaning of the way things appear as free from one and many, they are not established as existent.

original: de ni de dag chos nyid sgyu ma lta bu yin pa de'i phyir med ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni de dag chos nyid sgyu ma lta bu yin pa de'i phyir med ces bya'o //
translated: Since they are the illusion-like reality of those, they are said to be nonexistent.

original: ri bong gi rva ltar med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ri bong gi rva ltar med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: They are not nonexistent like the horns of a rabbit,

original: de sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no valid cognition that establishes that.

original: ci ste mngon sum gyi snang ba'i dngos po de nyid sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir med do zhes sgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: ci ste mngon sum gyi snang ba'i dngos po de nyid sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir med do zhes sgrub par mi nus so //
translated: If it is argued that the thing that appears to direct perception cannot be established as nonexistent because it is illusion-like,

original: de yang mngon sum gyi sgyu mar mi 'dzin te /
analyzed: de yang mngon sum gyi sgyu mar mi 'dzin te /
translated: that is not the case, because direct perception does not apprehend illusion.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is because it is nonconceptual.

original: de la bzlog na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma'i stobs kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i nges pa'i dngos po de nyid sna tshogs pa thams cad mngon sum la snang ba tsam de nyid sgyu ma lta bu nyid du gzung ngo zhes brjod par bya'o //üîΩgang de lta bu'i bzlog na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma mngon sum mam /
analyzed: de la bzlog na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma'i stobs kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i nges pa'i dngos po de nyid sna tshogs pa thams cad mngon sum la snang ba tsam de nyid sgyu ma lta bu nyid du gzung ngo zhes brjod par bya'o // gang de lta bu'i bzlog na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma mngon sum mam /
translated: If you reverse that, then by the power of the valid cognition that contradicts it, that very thing that is ascertained as illusionlike is just the mere appearance in direct perception of all the various things. You should say that it is just that which is apprehended as illusionlike.

original: rjes su dpag pa gang zhig yin /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa gang zhig yin /
translated: What is the valid cognition that contradicts it? Is it direct perception or inference?

original: gal te mngon sum gyis bzung ba tsam bzlog na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum gyis bzung ba tsam bzlog na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma yin na /
translated: If the mere apprehension by direct perception is the valid cognition that contradicts it,

original: de yang mtshungs pa'i phyir bris pa nyid dang 'dra bas thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang mtshungs pa'i phyir bris pa nyid dang 'dra bas thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: then that is the same, so it would be like the written, and there would be an infinite regress.

original: ba lang rdzi dang bud med la sogs pa la bum pa la sogs pa mngon sum gyis grub pa bzlog na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma'i stobs kyis ma yin no //
analyzed: ba lang rdzi dang bud med la sogs pa la bum pa la sogs pa mngon sum gyis grub pa bzlog na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma'i stobs kyis ma yin no //
translated: When the direct perception of cowherds, women, and so on is reversed, it is not by the power of the valid cognition that contradicts it.

original: 'on kyang shes pa'i tha snyad 'jug pa nyid la ltos pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang shes pa'i tha snyad 'jug pa nyid la ltos pa yin no zhe na /
translated: However, it is dependent on the mere engagement of the convention of consciousness.

original: rnam pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo 'dzin pa'i phyir de ni mngon sum gyi tshad mas lus can thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba bzlog par dka' ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo 'dzin pa'i phyir de ni mngon sum gyi tshad mas lus can thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba bzlog par dka' ba'o //
translated: Since it apprehends the entity of the reality of all aspects, it is difficult to reverse the absurd consequence that all embodied beings would be liberated by the valid cognition of direct perception.

original: 'di dag de kho na nyid du 'dod pa yin zhes zer na /
analyzed: 'di dag de kho na nyid du 'dod pa yin zhes zer na /
translated: If you say that these are asserted to be reality,

original: de lta yin na ji ltar de kho na nyid du 'dod ces bya ba la sogs pa'i shes pa dang shes bya'i tha snyad du 'gyur /
analyzed: de lta yin na ji ltar de kho na nyid du 'dod ces bya ba la sogs pa'i shes pa dang shes bya'i tha snyad du 'gyur /
translated: then how could there be the conventions of cognition and object of cognition, such as ‚Äúthis is asserted to be reality‚Äù?

original: de ltar brjod pa kun rdzob yin no zhes zer na de ltar brjed par bya ba ci zhig yin /
analyzed: de ltar brjod pa kun rdzob yin no zhes zer na de ltar brjed par bya ba ci zhig yin /
translated: If you say that all such expressions are conventional, then what is it that is expressed in that way?

original: phyin ci log yin no zhes zer na de yang kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin du nub pa yin nam /
analyzed: phyin ci log yin no zhes zer na de yang kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin du nub pa yin nam /
translated: If you say that it is mistaken, then is that also obscured in the nature of reality?

original: shes pa'i rang bzhin de nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo bzung ba ji ltar phyin ci log yin /
analyzed: shes pa'i rang bzhin de nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo bzung ba ji ltar phyin ci log yin /
translated: How could the nature of cognition that apprehends the entity of the reality of all aspects be mistaken?

original: de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo yin yang phyin ci @13b log tu mngon par zhen pas 'jig rten pa'i shes pa'i stobs kyis phyin ci log ces brjod do zhes zer na /
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo yin yang phyin ci @13b log tu mngon par zhen pas 'jig rten pa'i shes pa'i stobs kyis phyin ci log ces brjod do zhes zer na /
translated: Although it is the nature of reality, it is called ‚Äúerroneous‚Äù by the power of worldly cognition, because of manifest adherence to the opposite.

original: 'dir 'jig rten pa zhes gang la bya /
analyzed: 'dir 'jig rten pa zhes gang la bya /
translated: What is meant by ‚Äúworldly‚Äù here?

original: ci 'dra ba zhig yang de'i shes pa yin /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig yang de'i shes pa yin /
translated: What kind of cognition is it?

original: gang 'di dag ni ma brtags na nyams dga' ba bsnyon par mi nus pa kun rdzob yin no zhes zer na /
analyzed: gang 'di dag ni ma brtags na nyams dga' ba bsnyon par mi nus pa kun rdzob yin no zhes zer na /
translated: If you say that the conventional is that which is pleasant when not examined, and cannot be denied,

original: de ltar yin na mi 'dod kyang gang de nyid kyi cha la mngon sum gyi tha snyad du 'jug par rung ba de kho na kun rdzob 'di tshad ma yin par khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar yin na mi 'dod kyang gang de nyid kyi cha la mngon sum gyi tha snyad du 'jug par rung ba de kho na kun rdzob 'di tshad ma yin par khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: then, although we do not accept this, we must accept that whatever is suitable to be called ‚Äúdirect perception‚Äù in regard to that aspect is a valid cognition in regard to the conventional.

original: sgyu ma lta bu nyid mngon sum gyis grub pa ma yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu nyid mngon sum gyis grub pa ma yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: You should understand that the illusion-like is not established by direct perception.

original: 'on te phyin ci log la gnod pa'i rjes su dpag pa'i stobs yin la /
analyzed: 'on te phyin ci log la gnod pa'i rjes su dpag pa'i stobs yin la /
translated: Or, if it is the power of inference that refutes error,

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin tsam nyid mngon sum gyis grub pa sgyu ma lta bu gzhag mod kyi /
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin tsam nyid mngon sum gyis grub pa sgyu ma lta bu gzhag mod kyi /
translated: The mere nature of things is established by direct perception, and is posited as being like an illusion.

original: de ltar mngon sum gyis grub pa 'jig rten gyi shes pa ma yin par bsgrubs zin to //
analyzed: de ltar mngon sum gyis grub pa 'jig rten gyi shes pa ma yin par bsgrubs zin to //
translated: But it has already been established that the establishment of things by direct perception is not the perception of the world.

original: de kho na nyid grub po zhes zer na /
analyzed: de kho na nyid grub po zhes zer na /
translated: If you say that the establishment of reality is by direct perception,

original: de lta yin na shes pa dang shes bya'i tha snyad mi 'jug go //
analyzed: de lta yin na shes pa dang shes bya'i tha snyad mi 'jug go //
translated: then the conventions of consciousness and the object of consciousness do not apply.

original: 'on kyang kun rdzob tu yin par mjug thogs su bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang kun rdzob tu yin par mjug thogs su bstan par bya'o //
translated: But it is to be taught that it is only conventionally.

original: de bas na ji ltar mngon par zhen pa dang mthun par rang gi tshad ma ji lta bas nges pa dang ldan pa rjes su dpag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bas na ji ltar mngon par zhen pa dang mthun par rang gi tshad ma ji lta bas nges pa dang ldan pa rjes su dpag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, it is an inference that is endowed with the ascertainment of the valid cognition of each of the parties in accordance with their respective beliefs.

original: dngos po rnams sgyu ma lta bur gzhag pa ni nges pa yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: dngos po rnams sgyu ma lta bur gzhag pa ni nges pa yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //
translated: It is established that things are posited as being like an illusion.

original: de lta bas na 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa la sogs pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar snang ba 'di kun rdzob kyi bden pa yin la /

translated: One is born with the ability to cut attachment, to cut all clinging, and thus one aspires to the enlightenment of the Tathagata.

original: de bas na kun rdzob tu sgrib pa thams cad spong bar zhugs pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin kho na byang chub sems dpa' yin no //
analyzed: de bas na kun rdzob tu sgrib pa thams cad spong bar zhugs pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin kho na byang chub sems dpa' yin no //
translated: Therefore, the Bodhisattva is just the nature of the Dharma-dh√¢tu, by his very entry into the abandonment of all obscurations on the relative level.

original: sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i gzhir gyur pa nyid kyi byed pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i gzhir gyur pa nyid kyi byed pa zhes brjod do //
translated: And he is called the ‚Äúagent‚Äù because he is the basis of all the Buddhas.

original: de bas na 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, all the noble persons are distinguished by the unconditioned.

original: gzhi ni rigs la bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gzhi ni rigs la bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: But is not the basis the spiritual gene?

original: de bas na de sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa la sogs pa dang por ci'i phyir bstan ce na /
analyzed: de bas na de sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa la sogs pa dang por ci'i phyir bstan ce na /
translated: So why is the generation of the Thought, etc. taught first, since it is preceded by that?

original: don de dag gi dang po sngon du 'gro ba bden mod kyi /
analyzed: don de dag gi dang po sngon du 'gro ba bden mod kyi /
translated: It is true that these topics are preceded by that one.

original: 'di ni yang go bar bya ba la sngar 'bras bu shes par byas nas phyis rgyu bstan to //
analyzed: 'di ni yang go bar bya ba la sngar 'bras bu shes par byas nas phyis rgyu bstan to //
translated: But here, in order to make it understood, the effect is taught first, and then the cause.

original: ji skad bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dmigs pa gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji skad bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dmigs pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the object of the Bodhisattva as taught?

original: de'i rjes thogs la dmigs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i rjes thogs la dmigs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Immediately after that, in order to teach the object, he says:

original: rgyal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rgyal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The conqueror, etc.

original: gang gi phyir chos thams cad dmigs pa'i ngo bo ni bden pa gnyis las mi 'da' bar dmigs pas chags pa med par gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos thams cad dmigs pa'i ngo bo ni bden pa gnyis las mi 'da' bar dmigs pas chags pa med par gyur te /
translated: Because all phenomena, the nature of which is to be perceived, are perceived without going beyond the two truths, one becomes free of attachment.

original: de'i bden pa la dmigs pa rnam par dag par rtogs pa'i phyir bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa ma lus par spang ba'i ched du bya ba dang ldan par zhes bya bar 'brel te /
analyzed: de'i bden pa la dmigs pa rnam par dag par rtogs pa'i phyir bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa ma lus par spang ba'i ched du bya ba dang ldan par zhes bya bar 'brel te /
translated: Since one realizes the pure perception of the truth, one is endowed with the purpose of completely abandoning all obscurations together with their propensities.

original: chags pa med par 'gyur ba ni chags pa med pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: chags pa med par 'gyur ba ni chags pa med pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: The one who becomes free of attachment has the nature of being free of attachment.

original: byang chub ces bya bar 'dir yang 'brel ba yin te /
analyzed: byang chub ces bya bar 'dir yang 'brel ba yin te /
translated: The word ‚Äúenlightenment‚Äù is also connected here.

original: phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa bla na med pa la reg pa ste thob par gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa bla na med pa la reg pa ste thob par gyur pa yin no //
translated: One touches, i.e., attains, the unsurpassed, unerring realization.

original: de bas na byang chub ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa'i dgos pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na byang chub ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa'i dgos pa'o //
translated: Therefore, enlightenment is the purpose of perfecting one‚Äôs own goal.

original: de sems dpa' ni sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: de sems dpa' ni sems dpa' ste /
translated: The one who has that is a bodhisattva.

original: des byed pas ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba don dang ldan pa'i ming nyid de /
analyzed: des byed pas ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba don dang ldan pa'i ming nyid de /
translated: The name bodhisattva is meaningful because of that.

original: des na yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dang / legs pa dang / bzang po zhes bya ba'i ming thob po //
analyzed: des na yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dang / legs pa dang / bzang po zhes bya ba'i ming thob po //
translated: Therefore, he obtains the name person who has set out correctly, good one, and excellent one.

original: des ni dmigs par gyur pa bstan to //üîΩgang chos kyi dbyings nyid rtag tu rnam par dag pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi dmigs pa yin par 'dod na rtag tu rnam par gong nas gong du dag par khyad @16a * //
analyzed: des ni dmigs par gyur pa bstan to // gang chos kyi dbyings nyid rtag tu rnam par dag pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi dmigs pa yin par 'dod na rtag tu rnam par gong nas gong du dag par khyad @16a * //
translated: By that, the object of observation is indicated.

original: par du 'gro ba ji skad brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: par du 'gro ba ji skad brjod par bya ste /
translated: If it is asserted that the object of observation of the nondual wisdom of the pure dharmadhƒÅtu is always the dharmadhƒÅtu, then how should one explain the statement that it is always pure, pure in the highest degree, and pure in a special way?üîΩIt is taught:

original: chu khams gser dang nam mkha' bzhin //
analyzed: chu khams gser dang nam mkha' bzhin //
translated: Like the water element, gold, and space,

original: dag pa bzhin du dag par 'dod //
analyzed: dag pa bzhin du dag par 'dod //
translated: it is asserted that it is pure in the same way.

original: ces bstan to zhes zer na /
analyzed: ces bstan to zhes zer na /
translated: If one says this,

original: de lta yin na thos pa dang bsams pa'i shes pas nges pa'i dngos po'i rang gzhan du bsgom pa de bas na ji ltar gnas pa'i dngos po'i de kho na nyid mngon sum du bya'o zhes der mngon par zhen pas 'jug pa'i phyir bsgom pa'i khyad par gyisüîΩkyang der mngon par zhen pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon mi spong gi / shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i bdag nyid kyi rim gyis rnam par rtog pa thams cad spong ngo zhes zer na /
analyzed: de lta yin na thos pa dang bsams pa'i shes pas nges pa'i dngos po'i rang gzhan du bsgom pa de bas na ji ltar gnas pa'i dngos po'i de kho na nyid mngon sum du bya'o zhes der mngon par zhen pas 'jug pa'i phyir bsgom pa'i khyad par gyis kyang der mngon par zhen pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon mi spong gi / shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i bdag nyid kyi rim gyis rnam par rtog pa thams cad spong ngo zhes zer na /
translated: If that were so, then the seeds of the latent propensities of conceptualization would not be eliminated by the special meditation, since one would engage in meditation by conceiving of the reality of things as they are ascertained by the knowledge derived from hearing and contemplation.

original: de lta yin na phyi'i don 'dod pa'i gzhung gis kyang nyan thos la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa spong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na phyi'i don 'dod pa'i gzhung gis kyang nyan thos la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa spong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, then the scriptures of the proponents of external objects would also eliminate the conceptualizations of the ≈õrƒÅvakas and so on.

original: 'on te khas mi len na de'i phyir rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags mi spong bas phyogs gcig dag par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te khas mi len na de'i phyir rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags mi spong bas phyogs gcig dag par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But if you do not accept that, then it follows that your system would not eliminate the seeds of the latent propensities of conceptualization and thus would be a partial purification.

original: khyod kyi lugs ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: khyod kyi lugs ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: What is your system?

original: skyon med de gang gi phyir dngos po'i ngo bo gang cung zad ji snyed pa kun brtags pa yin te /
analyzed: skyon med de gang gi phyir dngos po'i ngo bo gang cung zad ji snyed pa kun brtags pa yin te /
translated: There is no fault, because all the natures of entities, whatever they may be, are imagined.

original: 'di dag thams cad la rigs pas dngos por ma grub pas dngos po med ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad la rigs pas dngos por ma grub pas dngos po med ces bya'o //
translated: Since none of them are established as entities by reason, they are said to be non-entities.

original: bya ba byed pa'i gang dag don ji ltar snang ba de dag ni kun rdzob yin par bstan te /
analyzed: bya ba byed pa'i gang dag don ji ltar snang ba de dag ni kun rdzob yin par bstan te /
translated: Those that perform functions, whatever they may appear to be, are taught to be conventional.

original: thos pa la sogs pa shes pa skyes pas de kho na nyid la sgrib pa'i rang bzhin can rim gyis thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i stobs kyis ji lta ba bzhin te /
analyzed: thos pa la sogs pa shes pa skyes pas de kho na nyid la sgrib pa'i rang bzhin can rim gyis thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i stobs kyis ji lta ba bzhin te /
translated: By the arising of the knowledge of hearing and so forth, the nature that obscures thatness is gradually relinquished by the power of non-attachment to anything.

original: sgyu ma lta bur shes pa nyid yang dag par byas pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bur shes pa nyid yang dag par byas pa nyid yin no //
translated: The knowledge that it is like an illusion is itself the correct practice.

original: rang bzhin gtso bor gyur pa ni rigs yin la /
analyzed: rang bzhin gtso bor gyur pa ni rigs yin la /
translated: The primary nature is the lineage.

original: 'gyur ba gtso bor gyur pa ni dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'gyur ba gtso bor gyur pa ni dmigs pa yin te /
translated: The primary transformation is the object.

original: gnyis po yang gnyis su ma grub pa la gzhi dang dmigs pa'i bye brag rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis po yang gnyis su ma grub pa la gzhi dang dmigs pa'i bye brag rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Both should be understood as the distinction between the basis and the object, which are not established as two.

original: dmigs pa 'di la brjod par bya ba mang du yod mod kyi /
analyzed: dmigs pa 'di la brjod par bya ba mang du yod mod kyi /
translated: Although there is much to be said about this meditative object,

original: ha cang thal ches pas gzhag go //üîΩ'bras bu cil btags nas byang chub sems dpa'i dmigs par byed ce na /
analyzed: ha cang thal ches pas gzhag go // 'bras bu cil btags nas byang chub sems dpa'i dmigs par byed ce na /
translated: I will leave it for the time being, because it would take too long.

original: de'i rjes la ched du bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i rjes la ched du bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Having thus taught the meditative object of the bodhisattva, in order to teach the purpose, he says:

original: ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: For what purpose, etc.

original: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud la byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud la byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya zhe na /
translated: For what purpose is the continuum of the bodhisattva called a great being?

original: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi sar sems dpa' chen po ste @16b tshad med pa'i sems can gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'i sems can gyi tshogs mang po la chos bstan pa mchog tu byed pa'i phyir mchog tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi sar sems dpa' chen po ste @16b tshad med pa'i sems can gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'i sems can gyi tshogs mang po la chos bstan pa mchog tu byed pa'i phyir mchog tu gyur pa'o //
translated: Because on the buddha stage, the great being, the great multitude of beings, the immeasurable multitude of beings, is supreme, because he is the one who teaches the Dharma to the great multitude of beings.

original: de bzhin du spong ba chen po nyid thob pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du spong ba chen po nyid thob pa ste /
translated: Similarly, he attains the state of great abandonment.

original: lta bar gyur pa'i bdag nyid lta ba sna tshogs pa rnams ni chen po ste /
analyzed: lta bar gyur pa'i bdag nyid lta ba sna tshogs pa rnams ni chen po ste /
translated: The great multitude of beings is the various views.

original: sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i sems can gyi tshogs kyis lta ba spangs pa'i thabs bstan pa ni gcod pa ste spong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i sems can gyi tshogs kyis lta ba spangs pa'i thabs bstan pa ni gcod pa ste spong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The method of abandoning the views of the multitude of sentient beings, whose extent is immeasurable, is cutting off, i.e., abandoning.

original: de nyid kyang rtogs pa chen po med na mi 'byung bas de dag gis de yang 'phangs pa de bas na 'bras bu rnam pa gsum thob pa la bsams nas sems can gyi don la bzhugs pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyang rtogs pa chen po med na mi 'byung bas de dag gis de yang 'phangs pa de bas na 'bras bu rnam pa gsum thob pa la bsams nas sems can gyi don la bzhugs pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: And that is not possible without the great realization. Therefore, they are called ‚Äúgreat beings‚Äù because they remain for the sake of sentient beings, thinking of the attainment of the three results.

original: de ni ched du bya ba bstan to //
analyzed: de ni ched du bya ba bstan to //
translated: This is the teaching of the aim.

original: dmigs pa dang ched du bya ba la khyad par ci yod ce na /
analyzed: dmigs pa dang ched du bya ba la khyad par ci yod ce na /
translated: What is the difference between the object and the aim?

original: mda' bkang ba dang 'ben la rgyab pa dang chos mthun pa ni bye brag yin no //
analyzed: mda' bkang ba dang 'ben la rgyab pa dang chos mthun pa ni bye brag yin no //
translated: The difference is that the object is like the bow, and the aim is like the target.

original: de dag la nye bar gyur pa ni dmigs pa yin no //üîΩgzhan gyis bskal ba ni ched du bya ba ste /
analyzed: de dag la nye bar gyur pa ni dmigs pa yin no // gzhan gyis bskal ba ni ched du bya ba ste /
translated: The object is that which is near to them.üîΩThe aim is that which is distant from them.

original: de gnyis kyi bye brag yin no //
analyzed: de gnyis kyi bye brag yin no //
translated: That is the difference between the two.

original: ched du bya ba'i rjes la da ni rdzogs pa'i ched du sgrub pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: ched du bya ba'i rjes la da ni rdzogs pa'i ched du sgrub pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, after the purpose, the accomplishment should be stated for the sake of completion.üîΩMoreover, the accomplishment is the activity which has as its basis the four realizations, such as the clear realization of all aspects, etc.,

original: de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi yul dang ldan pa dkar po'i chos spyi'i rten can rnam pa kun mngon par rtogs pa la sogs pa mngon par rtogs pa bzhi po re re yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rten can gyi bya ba niüîΩsgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi yul dang ldan pa dkar po'i chos spyi'i rten can rnam pa kun mngon par rtogs pa la sogs pa mngon par rtogs pa bzhi po re re yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rten can gyi bya ba ni sgrub pa yin te /
translated: and which is based on the universal basis of the virtuous dharmas of the three knowledges.

original: chos kyi sku ni mngon par rtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi sku ni mngon par rtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The Dharma Body is not the clear realization,

original: 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir de la bya ba mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir de la bya ba mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the result, and because activity is not logical with regard to it.

original: de la go cha'i sgrub pa ni tshogs kyi yin par bzung ngo //
analyzed: de la go cha'i sgrub pa ni tshogs kyi yin par bzung ngo //
translated: The armor-like accomplishment is to be understood as the collection.

original: 'jug pa'i sgrub pa ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa yin par rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i sgrub pa ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa yin par rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The entrance accomplishment is to be understood as the stage of action out of faith.

original: chogs kyi bsgrub pa ni rtse mo dang sbyin pa la sogs pa drug dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / zung du 'jug pa'i lam dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / ye shes dang / bsod nams dang / lam dang / gzungs kyi tshogs rnams ni chos kyi mchog chen pos bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: chogs kyi bsgrub pa ni rtse mo dang sbyin pa la sogs pa drug dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / zung du 'jug pa'i lam dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / ye shes dang / bsod nams dang / lam dang / gzungs kyi tshogs rnams ni chos kyi mchog chen pos bsdus pa yin no //
translated: The practice of the accumulations is included in the great supreme mundane qualities, namely, the peak, the six, i.e., generosity, etc., calm, insight, the path of union, skill in means, knowledge, merit, the path, and the accumulation of retention.

original: sa dang po rab tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin tshogs kyi sgrub pa ni mthong ba'i lam gyi bdag nyid can yin no //
analyzed: sa dang po rab tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin tshogs kyi sgrub pa ni mthong ba'i lam gyi bdag nyid can yin no //
translated: The practice of the accumulations, which has the nature of the first stage, the Joyous, is of the nature of the path of insight.

original: sa gnyis pa la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin ni yang lam gyi tshogs @17a * //üîΩkyi rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: sa gnyis pa la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin ni yang lam gyi tshogs @17a * // kyi rang bzhin yin no //
translated: The practice of the accumulations, which has the nature of the second stage, etc., is of the nature of the path of cultivation.

original: gnyen po'i bdag nyid can yang tshogs kyi bsgrub pa ni lam gnyis ka'i spyod yul can yin no //
analyzed: gnyen po'i bdag nyid can yang tshogs kyi bsgrub pa ni lam gnyis ka'i spyod yul can yin no //
translated: The practice of the accumulations, which has the nature of the antidote, is the domain of both paths.

original: nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa ni yang bsgom pa'i lam yin te /
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa ni yang bsgom pa'i lam yin te /
translated: The practice of definite emergence is the path of cultivation.

original: rab kyi mthar thug par 'gro ba'i rten can yin te /
analyzed: rab kyi mthar thug par 'gro ba'i rten can yin te /
translated: It has the nature of the highest perfection.

original: de ltar sa gang du thog mar goms par byas pa'am /
analyzed: de ltar sa gang du thog mar goms par byas pa'am /
translated: Thus, on whatever level one first trains,üîΩ

original: thob pa de la ltos pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: thob pa de la ltos pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Thus, it should be understood that the stages are dependent on the first cultivation or attainment of any stage.

original: sgrub pa bzhi po de dag kyang khyad par gyi rang bzhin rnam pa thams cad sbyor ba ni mi nus pas spyir bstan gyi /
analyzed: sgrub pa bzhi po de dag kyang khyad par gyi rang bzhin rnam pa thams cad sbyor ba ni mi nus pas spyir bstan gyi /
translated: These four practices are taught in general, since it is not possible to apply all the aspects of their nature to the distinctions.

original: 'dir khyad par ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir khyad par ni ma yin te /
translated: Here, there is no distinction,

original: bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir blo dman pa rjes su gzung ba yin no //
analyzed: bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir blo dman pa rjes su gzung ba yin no //
translated: but rather a summary, in order to guide those of lesser intellect.

original: gzhan du bslab par 'dod pas bye brag rnams sbyor na ma 'brel pa bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du bslab par 'dod pas bye brag rnams sbyor na ma 'brel pa bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one wishes to train in the distinctions elsewhere, one should apply the distinctions, otherwise one would be teaching without connection.

original: de ltar phyi ma rnams la yang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar phyi ma rnams la yang blta bar bya'o //
translated: This should be understood in the same way for the later stages as well.

original: de la dang po brtson 'grus kyi rang bzhin go cha'i bsgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen por gdags pa'i rgyu mtshan gtong ba che zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de la dang po brtson 'grus kyi rang bzhin go cha'i bsgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen por gdags pa'i rgyu mtshan gtong ba che zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: There, in order to teach the armor practice, which is the nature of effort, the reason for designating the great being is stated: ‚Äúgreat giving,‚Äù and so on.

original: de la thams cad stong pa'i bsam pa yod pa'i phyir gtong ba che ba'o //
analyzed: de la thams cad stong pa'i bsam pa yod pa'i phyir gtong ba che ba'o //
translated: There, it is ‚Äúgreat giving‚Äù because the intention of the emptiness of all is present.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa rgya chen po dang ldan pas na blo che'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa rgya chen po dang ldan pas na blo che'o //
translated: The great mind is the possession of the vast morality of the Bodhisattva vow, and so forth.

original: gzhan gyis gnod pa la ji mi snyam pa la sogs pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pas na mthu che ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis gnod pa la ji mi snyam pa la sogs pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pas na mthu che ba'o //
translated: The great power is the possession of the patience of not minding the harm done by others, and so forth.

original: sems can gyi don gyi brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pas na theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi don gyi brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pas na theg pa chen po'o //
translated: The great vehicle is the possession of the power of the striving which is for the sake of sentient beings.

original: sems rtse gcig pa thob pas na mchog go //
analyzed: sems rtse gcig pa thob pas na mchog go //
translated: The supreme is the attainment of the one-pointed mind.

original: las dang byed pa po dang bya ba gsum gyi dmigs pa ni shes rab dang ldan pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la zhugs pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o //üîΩde ltar go cha'i bsgrub pas khyad par du 'gro bas gnyis pa 'jug pa'i sgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir /
